chart.title: Share of the population living with HIV
chart.subtitle: Estimated share of the population aged 15–49 living with [HIV](#dod:hiv).
chart.citation: Joint United Nations Programme on HIV/AIDS (2024)

HIV prevalence - Sex: total - Age: 15-49.titleShort: Share of the population living with HIV
HIV prevalence - Sex: total - Age: 15-49.titleLong: Share of the population living with HIV - aged 15-49, central estimate
HIV prevalence - Sex: total - Age: 15-49.descriptionShort: Share of people aged 15-49 who test positive for HIV at a given time. This is the central estimate.
descriptionKey: Known as "HIV prevalence", it is estimated by dividing the number of people in a given group who tested positive for HIV by all the people that were tested.
HIV prevalence - Sex: total - Age: 15-49.citationShort: Joint United Nations Programme on HIV/AIDS (2024) – with minor processing by Our World in Data
HIV prevalence - Sex: total - Age: 15-49.citationLong: Joint United Nations Programme on HIV/AIDS (2024) – with minor processing by Our World in Data. “Share of the population living with HIV – aged 15-49, central estimate” [dataset]. Joint United Nations Programme on HIV/AIDS, “Global AIDS Update” [original data].
